translations.african-market.description: IDEM is a Cameroonian tech company with a pan-African mission. We understand African markets, cultures, and challenges because we're building from within the continent.
translations.african-market.builtByAfricans: Built by Africans, designed for African success
translations.african-market.fromLagosToNairobi: From Lagos to Nairobi, Dakar to Johannesburg - IDEM is the platform of choice for African innovators
translations.african-market.leadingInnovation: African entrepreneurs leading innovation with IDEM
translations.african-market.learnMoreAboutVision: Learn more about our expansion roadmap, regional opportunities, Cameroonian founders, and why IDEM is uniquely positioned to serve African entrepreneurs.
translations.african-market.learnMoreButton: Learn More About Our African Mission
translations.african-market.stats.techStartups.label: Tech Startups Created Annually
translations.african-market.stats.techStartups.descri: In Cameroon, Nigeria, Kenya, South Africa
translations.african-market.advantages.builtForAfrica: Business plans adapted to local markets, visual identities culturally relevant, architectures optimized for African constraints
translations.african-market.advantages.accessiblePric: Ultra-affordable $15/month plans with freemium credits. 60-80% cheaper than international alternatives
translations.african-market.advantages.localInfrastru: Sovereign cloud nodes across Africa. Data stays on the continent with low latency
translations.african-market.advantages.africanCommuni: Built by Africans for Africa. Contribute to a pan-African open source ecosystem
translations.brand-charter.description: IDEM creates comprehensive brand guidelines that ensure consistency across all your marketing materials and touchpoints.

translations.brand-charter.seo.serviceDescription: Comprehensive brand charter creation including color palettes, typography, logos, and visual style guidelines
translations.business-plan.description: Transform your business idea into a comprehensive, investor-ready business plan with detailed market analysis, financial projections, and strategic roadmaps using our AI-powered open source platform.
translations.business-plan.alt.businessPlanExample: example of business plan generated by IDEM
translations.business-plan.sections.executive.title: Executive Summary
translations.business-plan.sections.executive.descrip: Compelling overview of your business concept, mission, and key success factors
translations.business-plan.sections.market.title: Market Analysis
translations.business-plan.sections.market.descriptio: In-depth research of your target market, competition, and industry trends
translations.business-plan.sections.strategy.title: Business Strategy
translations.business-plan.sections.strategy.descript: AI fitness app with personalized workouts, approach to market entry
translations.business-plan.sections.operations.title: Operations Plan
translations.business-plan.sections.operations.descri: Detailed operational structure, processes, and resource requirements
translations.business-plan.sections.marketing.title: Marketing Strategy
translations.business-plan.sections.marketing.descrip: Comprehensive marketing and sales approach to reach your target customers
translations.business-plan.sections.financial.title: Financial Projections
translations.business-plan.sections.financial.descrip: Detailed financial forecasts, funding requirements, and return projections
translations.business-plan.examples.techflow.descript: AI fitness app with personalized workouts
translations.business-plan.seo.serviceDescription: Comprehensive business plan creation with AI-powered market analysis, financial projections, and strategic planning
translations.cta.description: Join Idem and transform your ideas into complete projects with our AI-powered open source platform. Generate logos, business plans, and deploy applications - all for free.
translations.cta.alt.idemPlatformInterface: Idem AI platform interface showing project creation workflow
translations.cta.seo.name: Call to Action
translations.cta.seo.description: Get started with Idem platform for AI-powered brand creation and deployment
translations.deployment-screenshots.title: Deploy {$START_TAG_SPAN}Your Way{$CLOSE_TAG_SPAN}{$LINE_BREAK} with IDEM
translations.deployment-screenshots.description: One-click deployment to any cloud. {$START_TAG_SPAN}AWS, Google Cloud, Azure, or your own servers.{$CLOSE_TAG_SPAN} Production-ready in minutes.
translations.deployment-screenshots.chooseMethod: Choose your deployment method and go live. No DevOps expertise required.
translations.deployment-screenshots.screenshots.quick: Zero configuration deployment. We handle everything and provide you with a live URL instantly.
translations.deployment-screenshots.screenshots.vps.d: Deploy on IDEM servers or your own VPS with full control and Docker Swarm high availability.
translations.deployment-screenshots.screenshots.cloud: AI-powered deployment on AWS, GCP with automatic resource provisioning and cost optimization.
translations.deployment-screenshots.screenshots.archi: Design and deploy custom cloud architectures with AI assistance, templates, or total control.
translations.deployment-screenshots.seo.name: Idem Deployment Solutions
translations.deployment-screenshots.seo.description: Multiple deployment modes: Quick Deploy, VPS, Cloud Providers (AWS/GCP), and Custom Architecture Design
